commits.comment: DIRMINA-704 (in progress) add trunk, branches and tags dirs
move everything down to new trunk/ (DIRMINA-704)
[vysper] fix unit tests by retrieving the message from direct queue now (adjust tests to earlier refactoring) (LABS-337, LABS 340)
[vysper] unit test improvements contributed by Michael Jackl (LABS-337)
extract method to get message more elegantly
First stab at a Maven build
Fixed typo with remaining ftpserver URL (DIRMINA-696)

[vysper] VYSPER-17 (was: LABS-354): storage service reg, sustantial changes. Changing storage between in-memory and JCR is changing only one line of code now. all storages share a common interface and registry in the runtime context. two one-method interfaces AccountCreation and AccountVerification have been merged to make this more elegantly possible. UserAuthorization need no longer be exposed through the server runtime context. Adding users is now possible for in-memory user authorization, too. A bug when installing a single module has been fixed (initialize() not called).
[vysper] VYSPER-26 patch by Michael Jakl. thanks for contributing! applying patch partly, leaving out the handlers for now.
[vysper] VYSPER-25. async IQ responses are now possible and tested.
Added support for generating APT report from the Maven build. Run using mvn apt:process. Still needs to integrated with release assembling (VYSPER-41)
Adding the files used to request the upload of nekopull into the Maven repo. Can be removed when upload is complete
Reduced the dependencies somewhat, still compiles and tests successfully (VYSPER-41)
Improved detection of tools.jar to make the APT build work on IBM JDKs
[vysper] VYSPER-26. patch contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks!
[vysper] VYSPER-26. adding missing license header. patch contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks!
Adding some files into the svn:ignore property
o Removed all the @version tags o Removed some useless imports
Removed more useless imports
[vysper] restore garbled chars from r774707
[vysper] represent 'section' character with its unicode \u00a7 code
[vysper] VYSPER-51: applying patch 51.1: correct the disc#info integration of the pubsub module. patch contributed by Michael Jakl, thanks!
[vysper] VYSPER-60: moving pubsub packages, 'general' is becoming 'handler', 'owner' moving below 'handler'. original patch contributed by Michael Jakl.
[vysper] VYSPER-60: rename pubsub unit tests: append 'TestCase'. original patch contributed by Michael Jakl.
[vysper] VYSPER-26 only one dictionary per namespace neccessary and allowed
[vysper] VYSPER-7 roster manager could no longer be retrieved, must be fetched from storage provider registry now.
[vysper] upgrade smack libs to 3.1.0. (VYSPER-59)
[vysper] first take on data forms (VYSPER-61)
[vysper] VYSPER-7 make roster manager available through storage provider registry for unit tests, they pass again.

[vysper] change the way XMLElement getter return collection valued results: no longer return NULL, only return EMPTY_LISTs, makes depending code less error prone. save one new empty list creation in this case by first checking for emptyness.
[vysper] improve forms, add tests (VYSPER-61)
Removing temp repository from POM, no longer needed as nekopull is now available in central.
[vysper] handle requests for "service.domain.org" as info requests (no error, not a server info request) (VYSPER-10)
[vysper] implement extended service disco, allowing data forms in info request reponses (VYSPER-62)
[vysper] add spec compliance documentation (VYSPER-62)

[vysper] (VYSPER-52) ongoing pubsub code and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl: adds the base usecase for subscribing to a node. It does not contain error handling or persistent storage yet. The patch also adds the necessary model classes. The chosen node relationship (for now) is "flat-set" (see XEP-0248, Table1).
[vysper] implement date time profile (XEP-0082 as a utility (VYSPER-66)
[vysper] encoder no longer static, add javadoc (VYSPER-62)
Bumped up BouncyCastle from 135 to 140 to solve an IP issue
upgraded to mina 1.1.7
Setting source encoding from patch by Robert Burrell Donkin. (VYSPER-41)
Fixed a number of license headers (VYSPER-40)
[vysper] patch contributed by Michael Jakl, many thanks.

[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl, thank you. VYSPER-64: This patch is the first step (refactoring) towards persistence managers. It separates data storage and model logic. It's not complete (yet working).
[vysper] based on a patch by David Phillips. thank you very much for contributing. small improvements (VYSPER-72)

[vysper] inspired by a patch by David Phillips (see VYSPER-72). thanks for contributing. get UTC timezone object only once because this operation can be expensive for some revisions of the JDK (Sun JDK Bug ID 4936890)
[vysper] based on a patch by David Phillips (see VYSPER-72). thanks for contributing. change the way the apt tools gets referenced

[vysper] based on patches and bug reports by David Phillips. thanks for contributing! improve client compatibility. PSI needs xmlns:stream attributes on <feature> stanzas. PSI also sends newlines, which are not elements. this is fixed in the verifier which reports text fragements as elements. (VYSPER-1)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks again!
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements error condition 1 of section 6.1.3 (JIDs don't match) (VYSPER-65)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements error condition 11 of section 6.1.3 (Node does not exist)  (VYSPER-65)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements the general JID malformed error for subscribe to node  (VYSPER-65)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. refactores the subscribe handler (extract the error stanza-builder into their own methods).   (VYSPER-65)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implents error case 6.2.3.1  (VYSPER-67)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements error case 6.2.3.2 (no such subscriber)   (VYSPER-67)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements error case 6.2.3.3 and fixes some minor typos   (VYSPER-67)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements 6.2.3.4 and fixes a faulty comment in the subscriber handler (VYSPER-67)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements error condition 6.2.3.5 (invalid subid) (VYSPER-67)
[vysper] patch and commit comment contributed by Michael Jakl. thanks. implements JID malformed error condition (VYSPER-67)
[vysper] patch contributed by David Phillips. Many thanks. (VYSPER-72) Implement XEP-0049 Private XML Storage
identify directed presence stanza, issue a warning until feature gets implemented (VYSPER-6)
Nekopull has been added to Maven central, removing draft files
Extracted the code for generating error stanzas. This is part of VYSPER-63.
Add JavaDocs and more SpecComplant annotations. Replace tabs with spaces. Touches VYSPER-77 and VYSPER-78.
Removed an unnecessary import.
Replaced tabs with 4 spaces.
Fixing typos in Javadoc
Adding support for XEP-0199 client to server pings (VYSPER-12)

* Use the provided ServerErrorResponse class to generate error stanzas for pubsub requests. * Fixed some typos in the javadoc. * Add SpecClompliant annotations to handler methods. Fixes VYSPER-63 and VYSPER-77
Renamed accept (to visit each subscriber of a node) to acceptForEachSubscriber to give an intuition what the methods does/should do.
Split up the PubSubPersistenceManager into CollectionNodeStorageProvider and LeafNodeStorageProvider. Renamed to conform to the top-level interface naming (StorageProvider). (VYSPER-81)
fixed a little typo

* Reworked the NullPersistenceManager into two separate StorageProviders (one for collection nodes, one for leaf nodes). * The new storage providers are default (configured at object creation) and keep all objects in memory (fallback if no other storage provider is configured). * Moved all storage related classes into their own package (storageprovider). * Applied uniform naming (storage provider instead of persistence manager).
* Made disco testable for the pubsub module * Fixed some minor typos in javadoc * dico#info for the pubsub service is tested
Fixed documentation of the test for pubsub related disco#info.
Added trace-level logging for sending notification messages.
Implemented service discovery for items (disco#items) of the. * Prepared for node-hierarchies * Fixed minor typos Fixes VYSPER-83.

Fixes VYSPER-51. * Make LeafNodes disco#info discoverable * Removed name of the root-collection node * Made nodes available via their name instead of the full JID * Removed the need for a JID within a LeafNode (name is unique)
Added <feature var='http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub'/> to disco#info for LeafNodes
Implemented disco#items for LeafNodes. Fixes VYSPER-84.
More elaborate tests for the success case of the publish use-case.

Introduced a new wrapper for the payload (PayloadItem) which stores the time we received the message and hence is used to return the list of items in a non-arbitrary ordering for disco#items (reversed chronological). Fixes VYSPER-84.
Deal with publish error-cases (node unknown, not enough privileges). Fixes VYSPER-71.
Removed wrong (left over) comment.
Added a test to make sure that published items with the same id get overwritten.
Store publisher of an item.
Refactoring towards easier features checking.
Added missing leaf-node features and supporting classes (all features known to XEP0060).
Features are addressed as "anchors" within the pubsub namespace, not autonomous URLs. Fixed.
Convert names of static variables to uppercase. Instead of specifying whether a feature is optional, required or recommended with a string, we now use a enumeration (Level).
Rename "Level" to "PubsubFeatureLevel" (more descriptive name).
Changed loggger level from error to warning if no storage manager is configured. Warning is enough since we provide a default (in-memory) solution.
Create Node (open access) implemented. Fixes VYSPER-55.
Added an eventual exception to the debug logger to make tracing the error easier.
Added debug logging to make tracing errors easier (corrected previous commit).
removed "item-does-not-exist" stanza error condition - it is not defined in the XMPP standard + is nowhere to be found in my copy of XEP-0060.
Failing testcase for VYSPER-92. Shows problems when no "from" address is added by the client.
Fixed a bug in the testcase - the NullPointerException came from the wrong method.
Take the sender address either from the "from" attribute provided in the stanza or, if it is not present, take the JID from the initiating entity.
add missing override annotations
Don't trust the sender with the "to" address, use the one in the sessionContext.
The in-memory storage provider did not differentiate between different nodes, fixed.
Add the namespace to a StanzaBuilder via addNamespaceAttribute instead of the constructor.
When debug is enabled, show the full stanza, not just the dense version.
Implemented the "delete node" use-case. Fixes VYSPER-57.
Added, removed and updated the SpecCompliant/SpecCompliance annotations for pubsub related classes. (VYSPER-77)
Refactoring:  * Renamed SubscriberNotificationVisitor to SubscriberPayloadNotificationVisitor to indicate that it includes payload.  * Removed some unnecessary imports.
Fixed the misunderstanding with namespaces for the pubsub related classes and the ServerErrorResponses class (VYSPER-96)

Refactoring: added a extractSenderJID and rename determineFrom to extraceUniqueSenderJID to XMPPCoreStanzaHandler. Also added a small note to getFrom of "Stanza" that it returns not sender most of the time.
Refactoring: Unify the extraction of sender and receiver for all pubsub handlers (through a common extractParties method).
Rename XMLElement.getNamespace() to XMLElement.getNamespacePrefix() to clarify it's intent
Adding Javadoc to getNamespacePrefix to document its behavior
Rename argument to make it explicit that users should provide the namespace prefix

Fix bug where the namespace prefix and element local name was mixed up Added XMLElement.getNamespaceURI() which attempts to return the correct namespace URI for the element. Replaced all instanced of using XMLElementVerifier for this purpose (as the method is broken). getNamespaceURI() does not yet support inherited namespaces. Fixes VYSPER-97.
Adding log4j config for tests so that we get console output from tests
Adding XMPP ping module to ServerMain
Improve unit test log4j config
Clarify use of namespace prefix
Fixing bug in Nekopull parser where the namespace URI is used as the prefix
Fixed bug where NS prefix was used in comparison instead of URI
Fixing various incorrect mixups of namespace prefixes and URIs. Adding a new StanzaBuilder constructor to make this explicit.
Fixing bug where we included the wrapper element in error responses (VYSPER-98)
Fixed incorrect example
Adding integration tests for XEP-0199 XMPP Ping (VYSPER-12). AbstractIntegrationTest should go somewhere else once we decide that we want to do tests like this.
Removing Ant build stuff (VYSPER-41). Build is now all Maven.

"features" element should be in the stream namespace
fix VYSPER-154: handle presence probes a little bit more correctly

use AbstractBaseCache for SimplePresenceCache, too reduced visibility for some methods move ehcache.xml to config/ where it resides together with the other configurations.

Adding MUC namespace

allow to specify additional modules on the command line (VYSPER-167).
Allow creating an EntityImpl with JID and name
Adding MUC module Adding MUC model and storage provider stubs with some basic implementation Implemented service discovery for component (VSYPER-102, VYSPER-103)
Moved the pubsub "feature" classes into their own package. Corrected spelling of CollectionNodeInMemoryStorageProvider.
(Forgot to commit the changes to the testcases) Moved the pubsub "feature" classes into their own package. Corrected spelling of CollectionNodeInMemoryStorageProvider.
Corrected spelling of CollectionNodeInMemoryStorageProvider.

Introduced the concept of "affiliation" and "privilege" into the pubsub module. Currently the creator of a node is the owner, and hence is allowed to publish, delete etc. Everyone else is only a "member" (open-access model) and is allowed to subscribe.

Huge refactoring. Removed the "root" collection node from the handlers and introduced a service configuration object containing the root node, the server JID and the storage providers. First step towards VYSPER-156.
Added missing visibility keywords and removed too specific methods from the interfaces.
A user is now able to retrieve his/her subscriptions to a single node or to all nodes (retrieve-subscriptions). This fixes VYSPER-85.
A user is now able to retrieve his/her affiliations to all nodes (retrieve-affiliations). This fixes VYSPER-171.
Implemented disco of room information (VYSPER-104)
Allow for namespace handlers also for presence and message stanzas, need for MUC
Add toString()
Adding additional MUC namespaces
Adding a default presence handler for presence extensions
Implemented basic support for entering a room (VYSPER-109). However, none of the extended support (password protected rooms, affiliation, member-only rooms and so on) is yet implemented.
Support for sending extra information for non-anonymous and semi-anonymous rooms on entering (VYSPER-109)
Add convinence method for getting the complete inner text
Add support for entering password protected room (VYSPER-109)
Add support for letting modules register for subdomains (e.g. pubsub.vysper.org) on which all stanzas will be routed to that handler if the "to" attribute matches the subdomain (VYSPER-172)
Removing temporary repository since Smack 3.1.0 is now in Maven central
TestUtil incorrectly extended TestCase
If no namespace is declared, return null rather than an empty string
Fixing typo
retrofitting addModules() for Spring by introducing a subclass of DefaultServerRuntimeContext which has a setter called "setModules".
prepare MUC and PubSub for easy inclusion, but leave them commented out
add javadocs, reduce visibility for internal method
Initial commit of the pubsub demo application.
Added missing source files and adapted the pom.xml to compile with Java 5 compatibility.
Remove @Override for implemented abstract methods to make the code Java 5 compatible.
Implement exit room (VYSPER-110) Implementing HandlerDictionary for the module
Implement status messages when exiting room (VYSPER-110)
Abstract class for implementing message handlers
Make "lang" optional for message stanzas
Implement sending message stanzas to room (VYSPER-117)
Dialog for login credentials (prefilled with our demo user) added.
Added the possibility to create new nodes. Extracted the table model as a separate class.
It is now possible to delete a node (if the user is the owner). Split up the GUI and model (little refactoring).
Fixed enabling and disabling of the delete button.
Added a refresh button to reload all nodes (sync with server).
Keep the node-list sorted.
Reuse the MessageHandler of vysper-core for delivering pubsub event messages.
Publishing and receiving messages is now possible.
Reverting change where we returned null instead of an empty string for elements in the empty namespace.
Changed namespace existing check to use empty string rather than null
Fixed typo
Reverting to not using namespace handler lookup for presence and message type stanzas for now
Add simpler constructor Add message handler to dictionary
Add null checks in constructor and toString
Adding integration test case for MUC (in MUC module for now)
Message.Stanza.getMessageType: fix method name, add stanza builder convenience method and use type- and value-safe variable from within MUC.
Allow for multiple clients for integration tests
Prevent that a pubsub event listener is added more than one times.
Removed setFillsViewportHeight to make the sources JDK5 compatible.
Implement room items disco (VYSPER-105)
createClone incorrectly compared attribute to be replaced for both name and value, meaning replacing them was pretty useless :-)
Replace local stanza clone method with StanzaBuilder
Implemented sending private messages (VYSPER-116)
Implemented forwarding disco requests for room occupants (VYSPER-106)
Add the original disco request ID to the InfoRequest.
Make use of the ID from the original request when forwarding disco requests (VSYPER-106)
Implment changing nickname (VYSPER-111)
Implement changing nickname (VYSPER-111) Add strong typing for status codes
Implemented 8.9.1 of XEP 0060 (Retrieve Affiliations for an owner). This fixes VYSPER-178.
Updated the JavaDoc.
Implemented "Manage Affiliations". Added the ability to change affiliations (VYSPER-160), and made sure that the last owner cannot resign (VYSPER-161).
Added "modify-affiliations" to the capabilities of the node (discovery).
cover potential error case with exception
Implement changing show and status presence (VYSPER-112)
VYSPER-179: change stanza delivery to the highest priorized receiver, instead of delivering to all possible receivers VYSPER-181: cover more delivery rules on inbound relay
VYSPER-181: move quite a few classes down in the package hierarchy
VYSPER-176: prepare routing inbound stanzas to a component
optimize import
Disable integration test until relay to component is fully implemented.
took the liberty to re-uncomment the test and modify it in a way that it must fail when the bug is fixed: so, we won't miss to re-enable it. ;-)

this is a complex commit - and it will have follow ups: in general, it routes directed presence stanzas through the client into stanza relay back to clients (as before) and (new!) to registered components. MUC acts as such a component. VYSPER-172: removes the previous subdomain handling and introduces a different approach, which does not hook into the sending clients session. Modules can now register as a component for a subdomain, retrieving all stanzas for this subdomain. VYSPER-176: improve internal routing to a component VYSPER-6: naive and preliminary implementation of outbound directed presence
components now have their own stanza processor, to operate indepently of the client-related processing. VYSPER-176: actually route to a server registered component
VYSPER-176: components now route responses back
VYSPER-108: retrieve the occupants address from the presence stanza
VYSPER-108: MUC presence stanza handling: use server context to relay stanza. joining room now works properly.
VYSPER-117: MUC message stanza handling: use server context to relay stanza. sending message now works on the MUC part, fails somewhere else.
VYSPER-176: re-enable MUC integration test and fix how JIDs are compared. test now succeeds again
fix one more MUC integration test
add convenience methods to create a forwarded stanza
VYSPER-6: route directed unavail presence
VYSPER-176: fix domain resolution glitch
MUC pom: move some libs from 'test' to 'runtime' target
MUC pom: move test lib back to 'test' target
MUC: create the domain muc is running on on intialization time
do not use Entity.getCanonicalizedName(), trigger toString() instead
VYSPER-6: add tests and fixes
fix circular dependencies in Spring bean declaration by deferring initializion stanza relay from constructor-injection to setter injection
VYSPER-62: support components in service disco
VYSPER-102: announce MUC component correctly in service disco
VYSPER-102: fix: show identity and feature on component info properly
VYSPER-102: fix: show identity and feature on component info properly - really!
Make body optional (to support it being added in later)
Add delay namespace
Fixing broken unit tests for MUC disco
Fixing broken unit tests for MUC disco
Allow for getting inner elements by name and namespace URI
Implement discussion history (still lacking support for "seconds" and "since" in the history element) (VYSPER-109)
Add test for entering room with the old groupchat protocol (VYSPER-109)
Cleanup stanza element handling (more to come)
Cleanup stanza element handling
Implement invites (VYSPER-113)
Implement affiliation support in room includinbg handling of banned users trying to enter room
Implement not letting non-mmbers entering member only rooms
add @Override
VYSPER-183 add missing returns from program flow. fixes the issue of doubly sent MUC messages
Adding missing license header
Configure Smack to time out after 5 seconds waiting for a packet
Add support for parsing date times
Rewrote date time parsing into using Calendar as it makes it much easier to reason about time zones. Also switched from using SimpleDateFormat for parsing, to a regexp based implementation.
Implement retrieving discussion history based on "seconds" or "since" attributes (VYSPER-109)
Implement room subject change (VYSPER-155, VYSPER-123)
Mark test template as abstract

Removing extraneous constructors on XMLElement and Stanza which causes a lot of null castings Added support for keeping the namespace URI and prefix on attributes, a step towards full namespace support
Fix bug where attribute values might contain characters that must be escaped in XML
Use convenience method for adding attributes

Attributes now fully supporting XML namespaces except for namespace inheritance. This change means that new Attribute("foo:bar", "value") should not be new Attribute("http://example.com", "bar", "value"). Same for XMLElement.getAttribute() and friends. All instances where we used the old way has been replaced (use of xml:lang). This is quite an intrusive change so keep an eye out for breakage
Adding stub project for non-blocking XML parser module
Moved XML fragment classes into new module
Moved XML fragment classes into new module
Ignoring files
Fix broken escaping of reserved characters in XML text
Add namespaceURI to the XMLElement constructor. This is part of the large change to get full namespace support into XML parser. More changes to follow.
Further changes to make Renderer namespace aware. Now support namespace inheritance
Fix a bug where the renderer would not correctly reset a default namespace
Extract StanzaBuilder and XMLElementBuilder into a abstract super class to remove code duplication
Moved the XML parser over to the XML module
Make namespace attribute order predictable
Fix setting namespaces for the initial sequence
Allow for some extra time for setting up the server for integration tests
Remove the use of addNamespaceAttribute(String) from most places as it is no longer needed
Extend the time allowed during the test. First run will initiate NodePrep which takes about 1 second on the first run meaning the test would fail frequently
Move execution of integration tests to a profile
Adding namespaces on stanzas (right now these gets rendered on each stanza, will be removed when we get a stateful resolver) Cleaning up some invalid use of getNamespacePrefix()
Adding a simple statemachine when parsing XML as to handle some odd cases

Renamed packaged for XML implementation

no longer need to wait arbitrary time for recorded stanza, add feature in TestSessionContext to block and return or fail after some time

VYSPER-186 fix for double sent pres available
VYSPER-185: communicate end-of-session-cause to the handler, shield against duplicate handling and races, do not send unavailable to self after stream error

make in-memory storage the default, since JCR has a severe issue (VYSPER-73)

VYSPER-179: relay message to either only highest prio sessions, or to all non-negative sessions (default), see http://xmpp.org/internet-drafts/draft-ietf-xmpp-3921bis-05.html#rules-barejid-resource-message includes improvements in delivery error handling

VYSPER-299: introduce stop() method to StanzaRelay to be able to properly shutdown resources (like executor services). Patch based on code by Mike Mahoney. Thanks for opening the issue and contributing!
Removing non longer used method

Fix to address VYSPER-18. Modifications to XML parsing/handling in order to recognize and act on stream close events. This fix adds a closed flag to the XMLElementListener that allows the XMPPDecoder to determine when a stream is closed.

VYSPER-304, VYSPER-305: BOSH: guard central context state fields against race conditions, make some methods and var names more expressive, add debug logging, use static final object for empty stanza, do not queue empty stanzas
remove close() method from XMLElementListener
VYSPER-307: remove proprietary Jetty Continuations,  use pure Async Servlet 3.0. Contributed by Stig Runar Vangen. Thanks for contributing!
jetty-servlet lib still needed for BoshEndpoint

+ rename writeBoshResponse() (again) + don't create standard stanzas over and over again + create less short-lived objects when merging + move helper methods from BoshHandler to static utilities + improve error handling and logging
Upgrade Jetty to 8.1.3.v20120416
Implement web socket support for Tomcat 7.0.27
Add JDK 1.6 activated profiles for Jetty dependent modules

Introduce a JDK 1.6 profile for distribution
+ reduce created objects, move helper methods from BoshHandler to static utilities

Implemented stream close handling to fix VYSPER-18. XMLElementListener now has a close() method that is called from the XMPPContentHandler when a </stream:stream> element is sent by the client. This can then be used to close a session.
VYSPER-302: add interface for logging stanza content. based on a patch by Stig Runar Vangen. thanks for contributing.
VYSPER-311: close session when invalid sid is received. for what it's worth, I don't like private fields very much.
MUC improvement: make test-specific methods available to tests, specifically.
VYSPER-312: introduce MUCFeatures, making room history length and nick rewriting configurable
VYSPER-313: Make MUC history accessible from outside, record MUC messages as type MessageStanza

VYSPER-321: record timestamps to make monitoring rooms more easy

BOSH: make async processing more robust, improve error reporting
